description: This copy (fol. 46b sqq.) contains 31 additional biographies as compared with Garrett no. 4932Y: Muṣliḥ al-Dīn, d. 977 (46b), Maḥmūd Chelebī ibn Muṣṭafá (47a), Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Najjar (47b), etc. The last three entries are: ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad al-Sīnūbī (78b), Abū al-Suʻūd (ibid.), and Parwīz ibn ʻAbd Allāh , d. 987 H. (84b). ff. 85. 192 x 97; 130 x 55 mm. 19 lin. 16th cen. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 560 (no. 2, Fortsetz. d and e); Ibn Gönül, Türkiyal mecmuasi VII/VIII, pt. 2 (1945) p. 155. Incip.: ... تبارک الذى نزل الفرقان
author: Āşiḳ Çelebi, 1520-1572
title: Dhayl al-Shaqāʼiq al-Nuʻmānīyah
creator: Āşiḳ Çelebi, 1520-1572
subject: Ulama—Turkey—Biography—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
